user_question: What certifications are required to become a professional drone pilot, and can you generate an image of a drone in action?
final_answer: To become a professional drone pilot, you need a Remote Pilot Certificate from the FAA. Image of a drone in action generated. In urban areas, you may need to obtain waivers for flying over people and beyond visual line of sight.
